display_long_description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
[media]
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
[media]
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
display_long_description_unprocessed:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=FoQhpOMghwEQ7kNvwFN-DRJ&_nc_oc=Adl_vTLOfELJEFIBQzY4PHedAuR-fzq_GpHWD7jbixabr7FlKLEyCS9g1IQ3iwYKsh8&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfFcilPcsy__45Xy31VbhQgMVpDqBCbUTIKtCqty2XxRUA&oe=6801A2CC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=M_hJLy3gDzwQ7kNvwFn0AWu&_nc_oc=AdmohqIcC6ki7zfuIKUqGXgyLpUWAJe88M_6tU3nuS12SkPgNsqPlK7DiYBHGZS8_HA&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfEK7nn9ISGkz38RJZZHpfMSmhVC-DNkxJfshOieo4WZSQ&oe=6801A0DF)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
